summary: This is my new Mod Add to new followers to the game a bad ass Mage could Yusuf and a fearless  Warrior could Connor thay are in River wood sleeping inn
descriptionHtml: This is my new mod add 2 followers to the game that are in River wood sleeping inn. thay are a warrior and a mage when thay are togever thay make a bad ass team and  i am going to be adding more stuff to this followers like a Followers house where thay are going to be living more followers will be added like pets.Follower dragon,and a lot more. next update coming soon
author: FuZioN
